scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run editor" "npm run dashboard" "npm run extension"
scripts.install: cd dashboard && npm install && cd ../extension && npm install && cd ../editor && npm install
scripts.build: cd editor && npm run build:cpy && cd ../extension && npm run build
scripts.check: cd dashboard && npm run check && cd ../editor && npm run check && cd ../extension && npm run check
scripts.check:watch: concurrently --kill-others "cd dashboard && npm run check:watch" "cd extension && npm run check:watch" "cd editor && npm run check:watch"
scripts.test: cd dashboard && bun test && cd ../editor && bun test && cd ../extension && bun test
